mapper.select: SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count FROM ie_mainlist WHERE ml_no between 1000001 AND 1000005 ORDER BY ml_count desc, ml_no desc
SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count FROM ie_mainlist WHERE ml_no between ${ml_no} AND ${ml_no}+4 ORDER BY ml_count desc, ml_no desc
SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count FROM ie_mainlist WHERE ml_no between ${ml_no} AND ${ml_no}+4 AND ml_tag like '%${ml_tag}%' ORDER BY ml_count desc, ml_no desc
